meanings.sent1: The cat became obese after eating too much.
meanings.sent2: She was concerned about her health because she was obese.
meanings.sent3: The balloon looked obese after being filled with too much air.
meanings.sent4: The room felt obese with all the furniture crammed inside.
meanings.sent5: The elephant's obese body made it difficult for it to move quickly.

meanings.definition: A person who is very fat or overweight.
meanings.sent1: The doctor advised the obese man to exercise regularly.
meanings.sent2: She felt self-conscious being the only obese person in the room.
meanings.sent3: The obese squirrel struggled to climb the tree with its heavy body.
meanings.sent4: The city seemed to be carrying the weight of an obese population.
meanings.sent5: The obese bear stood out among the other animals at the zoo.
